original_title: 劇場版タイムスクープハンター　安土城最後の1日
overview: A reporter is sent through time and space to document the lives of Japanese people at various times in history. This time, he is sent to unwrap the mystery of Azuchi castle which was built by Oda Nobunaga, one of the most famous shogun of all times, and lost within merely three years after its completion.
title: Time Scoop Hunter
